short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Immerse yourself in the serene beauty of nature with the Pine Forest Calm

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This theme showcases a close-up view of delicate pine needles in cool, calming green tones, with a single pine cone resting atop the branches. It brings a touch of tranquility to your browsing experience, perfect for creating a peaceful, natural backdrop as you navigate the web. Let this evergreen scene provide a moment of calm amid your busy day.

Key features:
- Customizable search bar and shortcuts.
- Real-time weather display and clock.
- Beautiful background.
- Quick access to frequently visited sites.
- News
